title: A Glitch in the Mandrake
author: verias
text:
Seems Mandrake made it back...albeit...she also seems to be having some issues being fully corporeal. We'll likely see more of how this cracked crystal impacts her very soon.

I'd like to thank you all for bearing with us lately, there's been a ton of life stuff on both mine and J's ends, and hopefully we'll be able to get back to regular updates incredibly soon!

replies.author: Sensei Le Roof*Guest*
replies.text: Oh dear, you've got a pixel just... no, not that way... careful, you almost put -- OH DEAR GOD WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!
